Package controller

Class AddAppointment

java.lang.Object
controller.AddAppointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointment extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is a controller for the AddAppointment view. It contains the methods onActionAddFirstLevelDivisions, addContacts, addUsers, onAddAppointment, onActionDisplayMenu, and initialize

  • Method Details

    • onActionAddFirstLevelDivisions

      public void onActionAddFirstLevelDivisions(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      this method is triggered when the country combobox is changed. it grabs the states from the selected country and populates the state combobox.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • addContacts

      public void addContacts() throws SQLException
      the initialize method triggers this function. it queries the database and adds contacts to the appropriate combobox.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addUsers

      public void addUsers()
      the initialize method triggers this function which adds the users from the database to the combobox.

    • onAddAppointment

      public void onAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      this method is triggered when the save button is clicked. it performs error checks and then adds the newly created appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • onActionDisplayMenu

      public void onActionDisplayMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      this method is triggered when the cancel button is clicked. it returns the user to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
